channel.title: Beginner - Alive in Jesus
channel.description: The Beginner Student Guide is written with young toddlers in mind. You’ll find engaging Bible narratives, play-based activities, and a spiritual message for parents.
channel.itunes:summary: The Beginner Student Guide is written with young toddlers in mind. You’ll find engaging Bible narratives, play-based activities, and a spiritual message for parents.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2025 General Conference of Seventh-day Adventists
channel.itunes:author: Sabbath School & PM

item.title: Lesson 3 - Samuel Listens to God (October 12-18)
item.itunes:title: Lesson 3 - Samuel Listens to God (October 12-18)
item.itunes:subtitle:
"Beginner, Year A, Quarter 4, lesson 3

BIG IDEA: God knows my name.

This lesson is based on 1 Samuel 3 and Patriarchs and Prophets, pp. 581, 582."

item.title: Lesson 2 - A Little Helper (October 5-11)

item.itunes:subtitle: Beginner, Year A, Quarter 4, lesson 2. BIG IDEA: I can be helpful. This lesson is based on 1 Samuel 2:18-21 and Patriarchs and Prophets, pp. 569-574.

item.title: Lesson 1 – Hannah Prays for a Baby (September 28-October 4)
